text: 17.5: Stt 22.2 naŋga, Lo 18.15 naŋga, Sng 2.7 naŋga, Ais 42.1 naŋga, Mt 3.17 naŋga, 12.18 naŋga, Mk 1.11 naŋga, Lu 3.22Pita kuyundavarahihi kanzirɨsirɨ ihumukɨrɨ mu, sɨñanzɨkwɨsɨkwɨ ŋandi nurɨŋ kavɨramami. Kamatɨhi ihumukɨrɨ humba kandɨhañɨ kuyu samur muŋandɨhin ambami, Ñɨŋi nɨŋandɨhin yandɨ, nɨŋambirɨm mavɨndamamaŋgarata, nɨŋambirɨm kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨnɨ. Kamataharɨm nuŋandɨ kuyu indarɨmara, vami.
